channel.title: Comments on: Pear and Custard Tart

item.title: By: Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: nice pics they all look so delicious !
item.content:encoded: nice pics they all look so delicious !

item.title: By: muppy
item.dc:creator: muppy
item.description: This looks so stunning, what a great dessert :)
item.content:encoded: This looks so stunning, what a great dessert ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Beautiful! From the picture I thought that you had an extra bit of pastry on top with a whole cut out to make a sort of 'well' for the custard and pear, but it's interesting how the edge bits just puffed up more to create the 'well' naturally.
item.content:encoded: Beautiful! From the picture I thought that you had an extra bit of pastry on top with a whole cut out to make a sort of ‘well’ for the custard and pear, but it’s interesting how the edge bits just puffed up more to create the ‘well’ naturally.

item.title: By: thelittleloaf
item.dc:creator: thelittleloaf
item.description: I've seen a couple of pear recipes for this competition now and yours looks especially delicious...love the beautiful arrangement of the pears and that delicate pastry.
item.content:encoded: I’ve seen a couple of pear recipes for this competition now and yours looks especially delicious…love the beautiful arrangement of the pears and that delicate pastry.
